item.title: Five Reasons The Army‘s Birthday Parade Was Money Well Spent
item.description: It is too bad the protesters can’t stop fighting Trump long enough to appreciate the Army that preserves their freedom to protest.

item.title: As Deportations Rise, The U.S. Is On Track For The Lowest Murder Rate On Record
item.description: When you let law enforcement catch criminals, you will get less crime.

item.title: The White House Can Lower Drug Prices By Fixing The Market, Not Price Controls
item.description: President Trump shouldn’t adopt socialist-style price controls.
